title: How Hackers Fooled Tech Giants Like Apple, Meta Into Giving Personal Data Of Minors - Indiatimes.com
content: How Hackers Fooled Tech Giants Like Apple, Meta Into Giving Personal Data Of Minors  Indiatimes.com
description: This data has reportedly been used to harass and even "sexually extort minors." Companies that seem to have been duped by fake requests include Facebook's parent company Meta, Apple, Google, Snap, Twitter, and Discord
